title: Listening to Quran while going to sleep disrespectful? | AssimAlHakeem -JAL
transcript:
And finally, the third question is from Ahmed;   'What's the ruling on listening to Qur'ān while 
sleeping every day?' I usually play the Qur'ān   in bed and sleep off while it's 
still playing. Is this considered   disrespectful?' The answer is, 'No'. There 
is no disrespect in this none whatsoever.   Going to bed while listening to the Qur'ān and 
falling asleep while the Qur'ān is being played   is totally permissible, and there's nothing wrong 
in that. And Allah, Azza wa Jal, knows best.
